TextBlock.Text: NOMAILEADER: What are you all still doing here? You should be on an escape pod and leaving!
SPOOKEDNOMAI: We tried, but the pod on the far side of the ship is entirely blocked off. We can not reach it.
ANALYTICNOMAI: Unfortunately, that seems to also be true of the pod on this side. We seem to be stranded.
CURIOUSNOMAI: How are we going to escape from this place? The <color=orange>Vessel</color> is our only source of oxygen, so we are unable to just fly away from it.
NOMAILEADER: Despite the frightful appearance of our environment, we do not seem to be in any immediate danger. We should regroup on the bridge and come up with a plan from there.
